bibdata.title: AIEE Proposed Guide for Operation and Maintenance of Turbine
Generators
AIEE Proposed Guide for Operation and Maintenance of Turbine - Generators

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Guide covers general recommendations for the operation, loading, and maintenance of turbine-driven synchronous generators of the types specified in Section 4, having cylindrical rotors and conventional cooling systems (in distinction from conductor-cooled systems). It does not apply to generators having salient-pole rotors.
